meanings.definition: Full of or characterized by humor; funny or amusing.
meanings.sent1: The comedian's performance was humorous and made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: She always tells humorous jokes that brighten up the room.
meanings.sent3: The humorous story about the talking animals entertained the children at the party.
meanings.sent4: His humorous take on everyday life situations is like a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The humorous cartoon characters were so lovable and brought joy to everyone.

meanings.definition: Having or showing a sense of humor.
meanings.sent1: Despite the serious situation, she maintained a humorous attitude to lighten the mood.
meanings.sent2: He is known for his humorous responses to difficult questions.
meanings.sent3: The humorous way she handled the embarrassing moment made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her humorous outlook on life is truly inspiring to those around her.
meanings.sent5: His humorous anecdotes always make people smile and feel at ease.
